document.full_text: ms. shields has previously taken over four broadway roles in productions that began with other actresses: roxie hart in "chicago," sally bowles in "cabaret," rizzo in "grease," and ruth in "wonderful town.
document.title: brooke shields will be the new morticia in 'addams family'
lines_and_colors: ms. shields has previously taken over four broadway roles in productions that began with other actresses: roxie hart in "chicago," sally bowles in "cabaret," rizzo in "grease," and ruth in "wonderful town.
